text:
Message 418 of 4024
Actually you were not. And we made great progress when we discussed and you saw immediate changes. You can stop the thread but I’m trying to
help.
Sent:01/15/2024 at 01:21 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/15/2024 at 01:28 PM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 419 of 4024
Please stop calling and texting
I have been very clear on ask. The fact that you have not provided these details and we are on day 5 since it was discovered is alarming.
I have communicated we are terrified and feel very unsafe with what may be out there and what may continue to be occurring.
The fact that you showed up to the game and waved acting like everything should be fine shows a complete lack of understanding and awareness.
We have asked for immediate disclosure of all items I outlined. You have refused for 5 days and it continues. That is on the record.
Sent:01/15/2024 at 04:39 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/15/2024 at 04:48 PM)
Subject:Disclosures
Message 420 of 4024
Please sent Xfinity’s account details to log in
My work computer has strangely been unable to connect to the dolce vita account since Friday. No one else has had an issue except me.
Sent:01/15/2024 at 04:47 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/15/2024 at 04:48 PM)
Subject:Xfinity
Message 421 of 4024
I have not heard about what you have asked for until today when you sent it. Please just talk to me for a second. Please!!! I am trying to solve this!
Sent:01/15/2024 at 04:50 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/15/2024 at 04:50 PM)
Subject:Re: Disclosures
Message 422 of 4024
I can tell you how to fix it. You just need to reboot the WiFi. It happens sometimes. Please give me a sec and we can fix it in 30 seconds.
